name: barramundi
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a fish that lives in rivers and lakes in Australia and Asia. Its flesh is eaten as a food: My uncle has promised to take me fishing for barramundi when I visit. My barramundi was served with a delicious sauce.
More examplesFewer examplesYou can catch barramundi on the lake at all times of the year.The river is well stocked with barramundi.We ate freshly caught barramundi, served with fresh vegetables.The waiter brought her a fillet of barramundi.
